amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit offshore oil and gas leases in Bristol Bay off the coast of Alaska.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 113-131 to prohibit offshore oil and gas leases in Bristol Bay off the coast of Alaska.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 235 (Roll no. 299).
